description:
Satsuki is asked to perform the after school broadcast in the wake of the previous announcers having fallen ill under mysterious circumstances. The only problem is, it seems the ghost of a deceased broadcast club member has invaded the system, intent on killing anyone that might upstage her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akane-san of the Broadcasting Room!! Voice of the Dead
Housou Shitsu no Akane-san!! Shisha no Koe
放送室の茜さん!! 死者の声
